samples.instruction: Internship eppadi kidaikkum? Apply enge?
samples.current_output: Internship sources: 1) College placement cell - company tie-ups 2) Internshala.com - largest platform 3) LinkedIn - direct apply 4) Company websites - careers page 5) Professor reference - industry contacts 6) Alumni network 7) Government internships - NITI Aayog, ministries. Tips: Apply early (6 months before), customize resume for each application. Unpaid internship: Experience valuable, accept if good company. Stipend: Negotiate politely.

samples.instruction: Age limit government college admission-ku irukkiradhaa?
samples.current_output: UG courses: Generally no upper age limit for most courses. Exceptions: Medical (25 for general, 30 for reserved), Law integrated (20), NDA (19.5). Minimum age: 17 years usually. PG courses: No age limit mostly. PhD: No limit. Government jobs: Age limits apply (varies by post). Reality: Complete your education at any age - many successful late starters. Distance education: No age restrictions at all.

samples.instruction: Salem/Erode region-la agriculture courses enge?
samples.current_output: Agriculture education Salem/Erode: 1) Vanavarayar Institute Pollachi - B.Sc Agriculture 2) Agricultural College & Research Institute Madurai (affiliated) 3) Horticultural College Periyakulam 4) KVK - Short courses. TNAU affiliated colleges admission through TNAU counselling. Farmers' children priority. Practical training in farms included. Jobs: Agriculture department, banks, own farming with modern techniques.

samples.instruction: NEET answer key-la mistake irundhal challenge panna mudiyuma?
samples.current_output: Mudiyum. NTA official website-la answer key challenge window open aagum. Rs.200 per question pay panni challenge pannalam. Valid challenge-aa irundha money refund aagum, marks adjust aagum.

samples.instruction: NEET Biology eppadi padippathu? NCERT enough-aa?
samples.current_output: Biology strategy: NCERT = Bible for NEET Biology. 90%+ questions NCERT-lirundhu direct/indirect. How to study: 1) Line by line reading 2) Diagrams by hand draw 3) Tables, flowcharts memorize 4) Previous year questions practice 5) NCERT exemplar problems. Additional: MTG, Trueman's for extra practice. Botany vs Zoology: Equal weightage. High scoring: Human Physiology, Genetics, Ecology.

samples.instruction: TNPSC Current Affairs eppadi prepare aavadhu?
samples.current_output: Current Affairs strategy: 1) Daily newspaper - The Hindu/Indian Express Tamil 2) Monthly magazines - Shankar IAS, Vision 3) PIB daily bulletin 4) TN Government press releases 5) YouTube - free CA classes. Focus areas: TN government schemes, India-international relations, sports, awards, science. Weightage: 25-30% in TNPSC. Last 6 months - most important. Make short notes daily. Revision: Weekly once previous weeks review.

samples.instruction: Student bank account open à®ªà®£à¯à®±à®¤à¯ à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿?
samples.current_output: Student account: 1) Zero balance accounts - SBI, Indian Bank offer 2) Documents: Aadhaar, college ID, photo, address proof 3) Benefits: ATM card, mobile banking, UPI 4) Scholarship DBT requires bank account 5) Education loan same bank = easier 6) Joint account option with parent 7) Fixed deposit for savings. Important: Keep minimum balance if required, avoid bounce charges. Link Aadhaar for DBT.

samples.instruction: Defence personnel children-à®•à¯à®•à¯ Prime Minister's Scholarship scheme à®à®©à¯à®©?
samples.current_output: PM's Scholarship Scheme for RPF/CAPF/Assam Rifles: Professional degree courses-à®•à¯à®•à¯. Amount: Boys - â‚¹2,500/à®®à®¾à®¤à®®à¯ (â‚¹30,000/à®†à®£à¯à®Ÿà¯), Girls - â‚¹3,000/à®®à®¾à®¤à®®à¯ (â‚¹36,000/à®†à®£à¯à®Ÿà¯). Duration: Full course. Eligibility: Children of serving/retired/deceased personnel. Apply: www.ksb.gov.in (Kendriya Sainik Board). Separate scheme for Ex-servicemen through Ministry of Defence - â‚¹5,000/à®®à®¾à®¤à®®à¯.

samples.instruction: Tamil medium-la padichaa future-la problem varumaa? English medium better-aa?
samples.current_output: Reality check: Tamil medium = Mother tongue strong, concepts clear. English medium = Language advantage. Both work! Important: 1) Foundation subjects (Maths, Science) any medium OK 2) English can be learned later 3) Many Tamil medium toppers in competitive exams 4) Government jobs no medium preference. Advice: Choose based on child comfort. Tamil medium + English tuition = balanced approach. Focus on learning, not medium.

samples.instruction: TNPSC-ku Tamil medium vs English medium - edhu better?
samples.current_output: Both equal opportunity. Tamil medium advantages: 1) TN textbooks Tamil-la padikkalaam 2) Answer writing easier 3) More candidates. English medium advantages: 1) Reference books availability 2) Current affairs sources more. Reality: Language doesn't matter, content matters. Toppers in both mediums. Choose your comfortable language. Paper can be written in either, no preference given. Focus on preparation, not medium.

samples.instruction: Competitive exam preparation-à®•à¯à®•à¯ daily routine à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ à®‡à®°à¯à®•à¯à®• à®µà¯‡à®£à¯à®Ÿà¯à®®à¯?
samples.current_output: Ideal routine: 5:00 AM - à®à®´à¯à®¨à¯à®¤à¯, fresh topics à®ªà®Ÿà®¿à®ªà¯à®ªà¯ (2-3 hrs). 8:00 AM - breakfast, current affairs. 9:00 AM - Practice/mock tests. 12:00 PM - lunch, short rest. 2:00 PM - revision, notes making. 5:00 PM - exercise/break. 6:00 PM - optional subjects. 9:00 PM - light revision, daily news. 10:00 PM - sleep. Weekly: 1 full mock test. Monthly: syllabus completion target à®µà¯ˆà®¯à¯à®™à¯à®•à®³à¯.

samples.instruction: Exam hall ticket tholaindhuviduthu - enna seiyvathu?
samples.current_output: Panic vendaam. School/College-la duplicate hall ticket vaangalam. Board exam-kku DGE website-la download pannalam. Exam centre-la ID proof kaatti emergency admit card peralaam. Principal letter-um udhavum.

samples.instruction: à®µà®¿à®µà®šà®¾à®¯à®•à¯ à®•à®²à¯à®µà®¿ à®ªà®Ÿà®¿à®•à¯à®• à®à®©à¯à®© à®µà®´à®¿?
samples.current_output: TNAU (Tamil Nadu Agricultural University) Coimbatore-à®²à¯ BSc Agriculture, Horticulture, Forestry courses à®‰à®³à¯à®³à®©. 12th Biology group-à®² à®ªà®Ÿà®¿à®¤à¯à®¤à®¾à®²à¯ TNAU counselling à®®à¯‚à®²à®®à¯ à®šà¯‡à®°à®²à®¾à®®à¯. Government job opportunities à®…à®¤à®¿à®•à®®à¯.

samples.instruction: à®’à®±à¯à®±à¯ˆ à®ªà¯†à®±à¯à®±à¯‹à®°à¯/à®…à®¨à®¾à®¤à¯ˆ à®®à®¾à®£à®µà®°à¯à®•à®³à¯à®•à¯à®•à¯ à®à®©à¯à®© scholarship?
samples.current_output: Support schemes: 1) AICTE Swanath Scholarship - â‚¹50,000/à®†à®£à¯à®Ÿà¯ orphans-à®•à¯à®•à¯ 2) PM CARES for Children (COVID orphans) - full support till graduation 3) Social Welfare Department orphan scholarship 4) NGO support - SOS Children's Villages, Udayan Care. Documents: Parent death certificate, guardian affidavit. Priority in government hostel admission. Apply through respective department.

samples.instruction: Degree mudinjachu. Job search panradhaa, PG padikkiradhaa? Confused-aa irukken.
samples.current_output: Decision framework: Job now if: 1) Financial need urgent 2) Work experience wanted 3) Industry-specific UG sufficient. PG if: 1) Academic/Research interest 2) Specific career needs PG (MBA for management) 3) Higher salary jump. Middle path: Job + Distance PG (IGNOU, University) OR Work 2-3 years â†’ PG. Reality: Both paths successful. No 'wrong' choice. Career isn't linear. Many do job â†’ PG â†’ better job. Decide based on YOUR goals, not others' opinions.

samples.instruction: Exam-à®²à¯ wrong answer à®à®´à¯à®¤à®¿à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà¯‡à®©à¯, cut à®ªà®£à¯à®£à®²à®¾à®®à®¾?
samples.current_output: Yes, cutting allowed. Method: Single line through wrong text, write correct above/below. Don't: Overwrite, scribble, use whitener (some exams prohibit). For MCQ/OMR: Circle filling rules strict - follow instructions exactly. If OMR mistake: Some allow correction with specific method. Essay type: Neat cutting = no penalty. Messy = bad impression. Time management: Better to continue, cut later if time permits. Rough work: Designated area only.

samples.instruction: School/College complaint enge koduppudhu?
samples.current_output: Complaint hierarchy: School: 1) Class teacher â†’ Headmaster â†’ DEO. College: 1) HOD â†’ Principal â†’ University Registrar â†’ UGC. Online: 1) CM Cell - www.cm.tn.gov.in 2) MHRD grievance portal 3) Anti-ragging: www.antiragging.in. Fee issues: Fee Committee. Documents: Keep written complaints, get acknowledgment. Serious cases: Police, Women's Commission (harassment).

samples.instruction: 10th/12th pass-à®•à¯à®•à¯ à®à®¨à¯à®¤à¯†à®¨à¯à®¤ government jobs apply à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®¯à®²à®¾à®®à¯?
samples.current_output: 10th pass jobs: 1) Railway Group D 2) SSC MTS (Multi-Tasking Staff) 3) TNPSC Group 4 4) Police constable 5) Post office GDS. 12th pass jobs: 1) SSC CHSL (LDC, DEO) 2) TNPSC Group 4 (higher posts) 3) Bank clerk (some) 4) Railway NTPC 5) Defence - Army, Navy, Air Force. Age: 18-30 (varies). Apply: Respective recruitment websites. Free coaching available through Employment Exchange.

samples.instruction: Counselling-à®²à¯ seat confirm à®†à®©à®¾, à®ªà®¿à®±à®•à¯ change à®ªà®£à¯à®£ à®®à¯à®Ÿà®¿à®¯à¯à®®à®¾?
samples.current_output: Options: 1) Tentative allotment - wait for next round, better college possible 2) Self-reporting - confirm seat, can still upgrade in subsequent rounds 3) Final allotment - must join or forfeit. Upgrade: Each round, vacant seats filled. Your higher choices reconsidered. Risk: If you reject and don't get better, no seat. Safe: Confirm in hand, upgrade if available. Fees paid = refundable if upgraded officially.

samples.instruction: NEET-ku class 11 irundhae prepare aaganuumaa?
samples.current_output: Ideal: Class 11 start. Why? NEET syllabus = 11th + 12th. Class 11 weightage: 45-50%. Strategy: 1) 11th: Concepts strong, NCERT master 2) 12th: Revision + new topics + mock tests 3) After 12th: Full revision + test series. Late starter (12th)? Focus 50% important topics, daily 10-12 hours. Dropper year: Structured coaching + self-study balance. Never too late - many crack in 2nd/3rd attempt.

samples.instruction: Online application submit à®†à®•à®², error à®µà®°à¯à®¤à¯
samples.current_output: Common fixes: 1) Clear browser cache, try incognito mode 2) Different browser (Chrome/Firefox) 3) Check file size limits (usually <200KB photos, <500KB docs) 4) PDF/JPG format correct? 5) All mandatory fields filled? 6) Internet stable? 7) Deadline passed? 8) Server busy - try late night. Still failing: Screenshot error, contact helpline. Alternative: Try from e-Sevai centre - they have dedicated lines.

samples.instruction: NEET/JEE-ku Free Coaching enga kidaikkum?
samples.current_output:
**Free NEET/JEE Coaching:**

**1. TN Government:**
- Naan Mudhalvan Program: naanmudhalvan.tn.gov.in
- District Collector free coaching

**2. TNSF:** Free residential for rural - tnsf.org.in

**3. Super 30 Programs:** NGOs, Free everything for SC/ST/EWS

**4. Scholarship Exams:**
- ANTHE (Aakash): Up to 100% off
- TALLENTEX (Allen): Up to 90% off

**5. Online Free:**
- SWAYAM, Khan Academy
- Physics Wallah, Kalvi TV

**6. SC/ST/BC Specific:**
- Dr. Ambedkar Free Coaching
- BC/MBC Scheme: bcmbcmw.tn.gov.in

**How to Find:**
- School HM, Collector Office
- Social Welfare Dept
- Local MLA sponsorship

samples.instruction: Madurai region-la top engineering colleges evai?
samples.current_output: Top engineering colleges Madurai region: 1) Thiagarajar College of Engineering (TCE) - Autonomous, top ranked 2) Government College of Engineering Tirunelveli 3) National Engineering College Kovilpatti 4) Mepco Schlenk Madurai 5) PSNA College of Engineering Dindigul. Admission: TNEA counselling. TCE cutoff high - 195+ for popular branches. Government colleges affordable - â‚¹50,000/year approx.

samples.instruction: ITI-la admission-ku enna procedure-nga? Fees evlo?
samples.current_output: 10th/8th pass pannirukkanum. www.skilltraining.tn.gov.in-la apply pannu/pannunga. Government ITI full free - fee illai, tools, books ellam free. Documents: TC, marks card, community certificate, Aadhaar. June-July-la admission start aagum.

samples.instruction: NEET Exam Pattern à®à®©à¯à®©? Marks à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ calculate à®†à®•à¯à®®à¯?
samples.current_output:
**NEET Exam Pattern 2024:**

**Exam Details:**
- Mode: Offline (Pen & Paper)
- Duration: 3 hours 20 minutes
- Total Questions: 200 (180 to attempt)
- Total Marks: 720

**Subject-wise Distribution:**

| Subject | Section A | Section B | Total |
|---------|-----------|-----------|-------|
| Physics | 35 | 15 (10 attempt) | 45 |
| Chemistry | 35 | 15 (10 attempt) | 45 |
| Botany | 35 | 15 (10 attempt) | 45 |
| Zoology | 35 | 15 (10 attempt) | 45 |

**Marking Scheme:**
- Correct Answer: +4 marks
- Wrong Answer: -1 mark (Negative marking!)
- Unattempted: 0 marks

**Marks Calculation:**
```
Total = (Correct Ã— 4) - (Wrong Ã— 1)
```

**Example:**
- Correct: 150, Wrong: 20, Unattempted: 10
- Score = (150 Ã— 4) - (20 Ã— 1) = 600 - 20 = 580

**Cut-off (Approximate):**
| Category | Marks (out of 720) |
|----------|-------------------|
| General | 600+ (Top colleges) |
| OBC | 550+ |
| SC | 450+ |
| ST | 400+ |
| Govt Medical (General) | 550+ |

**Important Tips:**
- Don't guess randomly (negative marking)
- Section B gives choice - attempt easier ones
- Time management crucial

guidelines:
EDUCATION PACK GUIDELINES:
- Tanglish is acceptable for modern education topics
- Keep exam names (NEET, JEE, TNPSC) in English
- Use Tamil for explanations: à®¤à¯‡à®°à¯à®µà¯ (exam), à®•à®²à¯à®²à¯‚à®°à®¿ (college), à®ªà®¾à®Ÿà®¤à¯à®¤à®¿à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà®®à¯ (syllabus)
- Format with emoji headers: ğŸ“š, ğŸ“, ğŸ“
